12 days

Mexico Beach Hopping: 12 Days

Caribbean, Pacific & Sea of Cortez

Mexico's coastlines offer incredible diversity—from the turquoise Caribbean and its cenotes to the powerful Pacific surf breaks and the dramatic Sea of Cortez. This 12-day itinerary takes you to four distinct beach destinations, each with its own personality, from bohemian backpacker to luxury resort.

Trip Highlights

  • Swim in Caribbean turquoise waters and cenotes near Tulum
  • Catch world-class waves at Puerto Escondido's Zicatela
  • Experience laid-back surf culture in Sayulita
  • Spot whales and swim with sea lions in Los Cabos
  • Four distinct beach vibes: bohemian, surf, village, luxury
  • Mix of adventure, relaxation, and nightlife
Duration
12 days
Best Time
November-April (dry season, best weather coast to coast)
Budget (Mid-Range)
$1,500-2,500 USD

Day-by-Day Itinerary

1

Arrive Tulum - Caribbean Coast

Begin on the Caribbean with Tulum's famous turquoise waters and jungle backdrop.

Today's Activities:
2

Tulum Ruins & Cenotes

Explore clifftop Mayan ruins and swim in crystal-clear cenotes.

Today's Activities:
3

Tulum - Lagoon & Free Day

Explore the seven-colored lagoon of Bacalar or enjoy a free beach day.

Today's Activities:
4

Fly to Puerto Escondido - Pacific Surf

Cross Mexico to the powerful Pacific waves of Oaxaca's coast.

Today's Activities:
5

Puerto Escondido - Surf & Sun

Learn to surf, watch the pros, and soak up Oaxacan beach culture.

Today's Activities:
6

Puerto Escondido - Bioluminescence

Daytime adventure and magical nighttime bioluminescent kayaking.

Today's Activities:
7

Fly to Puerto Vallarta - Sayulita

Travel to the charming surf village of Sayulita on the Riviera Nayarit.

Today's Activities:
8

Sayulita - Surf & Village Life

Experience the laid-back surf culture and explore nearby beaches.

Today's Activities:
9

Sayulita - San Pancho & Punta Mita

Explore the quieter neighboring beach towns.

Today's Activities:
10

Fly to Los Cabos - Sea of Cortez

Travel to the dramatic desert-meets-ocean landscape of Baja California Sur.

Today's Activities:
11

Los Cabos - Sea Adventures

Experience world-class marine life in the Sea of Cortez.

Today's Activities:
12

Los Cabos - Departure

Final beach morning and departure.

Today's Activities:

Practical Information

Getting There

Fly into Cancún (CUN), internal flights to Puerto Escondido (PXM), Puerto Vallarta (PVR), Los Cabos (SJD). Domestic flights on Volaris, Viva, Aeromexico.

Getting Around

Uber in tourist areas. Taxis where Uber isn't available. Rental cars optional but helpful in Puerto Escondido and Los Cabos.
